tool.name: demo3D10
tool.help:
**Description**
demo3D10 synthesizes one 3D image with nuclear, cell shape, and lysosomal channels with object files importable to Blender from LAMP2 model, with sampling method set to render lysosomes as ellipsoids without convolution. The model was trained from the Murphy Lab 3D HeLa dataset.
-----
**Input**
- Seed for Pseudo-Random Number Generator - Image Compression Algorithm - Downsample Factor
-----
**Output**
- One zip file with three TIFF (.tif) and three Wavefront (.obj) files containing the nuclear, cell shape, and lysosomal channels
-----
**Example**
The following image is generated using the default parameters:
.. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icaoberg/cellorganizer-galaxy-tools/issue42/tools/cellorganizer/images/demo3D10cell.tif :height: 500 :target: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icaoberg/cellorganizer-galaxy-tools/issue42/tools/cellorganizer/images/demo3D10cell.tif
